content: as if to purl pull the yarn through and drop the st off the needle repeat these four steps until all the sts are worked this pattern is copyright 2010 jo-anne klim all rights reserved for personal non- commercial use only do not reproduce or sell this pattern without written consent of the designer for pattern support please contact me at jo kbjdesigns@gmail com technical editor rhiannon mcculloch kbj designs ~ very vanilla socks 4 of 4 © jo-anne klim 2010
